title: Fix logo placement and positioning in Navigation and Home components

requirements.summary: Reposition logo in Navigation component with proper spacing and alignment to the left of 'CareerSphere' text
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image appears immediately to the left of 'CareerSphere' text in the navigation header
Logo and text are vertically aligned and centered together
Appropriate horizontal spacing (margin-right) exists between logo and text
Logo maintains responsive sizing: h-8 w-8 on mobile, h-10 w-10 on tablet/desktop
Logo displays correctly on mobile, tablet, and laptop screen sizes

file_operations.description: Update the Navigation component to reposition the logo image immediately to the left of the 'CareerSphere' text. Add proper horizontal spacing (mr-2 or mr-3) between the logo and text, ensure vertical alignment using flex items-center, and maintain responsive sizing classes (h-8 w-8 md:h-10 md:w-10). Reference the logo using the absolute path /assets/generated/logo.dim_512x512.png and preserve the alt text 'CareerSphere Logo'.

requirements.summary: Reposition logo in Home component hero section centered above the title with proper spacing
acceptanceCriteria: Logo image appears centered above the 'CareerSphere' title in the hero section
Adequate vertical spacing exists between logo and title text
Logo maintains responsive sizing: h-16 w-16 on mobile, h-20 w-20 on tablet, h-24 w-24 on desktop
Visual hierarchy is clear with logo, title, and tagline properly spaced
Logo displays correctly and is centered on all screen sizes

file_operations.description: Update the Home component hero section to position the logo image centered above the 'CareerSphere' title. Add appropriate vertical spacing (mb-4 or mb-6) between the logo and title, implement responsive sizing classes (h-16 w-16 md:h-20 md:w-20 lg:h-24 lg:w-24), and ensure the logo is centered using mx-auto or flex justify-center. Reference the logo using the absolute path /assets/generated/logo.dim_512x512.png and preserve the alt text 'CareerSphere Logo'.

requirements.summary: Verify logo file path and references in Navigation and Home components
acceptanceCriteria: Logo file exists at the correct path in frontend/public/assets/
Both Navigation.tsx and Home.tsx reference the logo using correct absolute path
Logo image loads without 404 errors in browser developer console
Logo displays in production deployment at the .ic0.app URL

file_operations.description: Ensure the logo src attribute uses the correct absolute path. The generated logo is located at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_512x512.png, so the src should be /assets/generated/logo.dim_512x512.png. Verify this path is correctly set in the img element.
